segments.text: How was your first date , David ? Are you satisfied with Jane ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was all right . She , tall and attractive , has stable job and source of income .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , so I think she is suitable for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But , well ... what I want to say is ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Stop acting like this . Say away !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Her standard for selecting life partner is a little higher . I can not accept that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She said she want a man with large house , luxurious car and healthy parents .
segments.speaker: S2
